reviewText: Writing this for the people that can't get it to work. My family and I ordered several copies. I came to realize that most copies of this movie on DVD are recorded over seas in what is call PAL format. Some US players may. It olay it because that is not our standard format here in the states. But most any computers will play it.
Call me crazy but this has seriously been my favorite movie since I was like 4 years old. Seriously..
Bought as a gift and did not work in 2 DVD players. Sent back to me . Tried in my DVD player and it worked fine. Now I have a movie I don't need.
Won't play in any DVD player!
Suppose to be in color and picture quality not very good
Loved the movie but the ending should have been 15 minutes longer.
